title: Unable to build my crate, cc cannot allocate memory.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-compilemem
labels.description: Problems and improvements with respect to memory usage during compilation.

body:
When I try to build my crate on my virtual server (debian 8 x64, latest updates, 2gb ram, 2 cores, latest rust toolchain) I get this error:

```

stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu unchanged - rustc 1.16.0 (30cf806ef 2017-03-10)
```
